name: Intercity Truck Simulator
description:
***PLEASE TRY FREE LITE VERSION, AFTER BUY IT IF GAME WORKING PERFECT ON YOUR DEVICE***

* Realistic Driving feel
* 55+ more cargo types
* 100+ more world cities
* 9 different trailer types
* Europe Style or American Style Truck types.
* Gamepad Support
* Repair, Eating, Fuel Station operations
* Earning Money with missions and Spend Money for your needs
* Traffic Accident, Truck Damage, Cargo Damage, Traffic Lights or Traffic infringement system
